alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:41PM CDT until August 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR EASTERN WALWORTH...WESTERN RACINE...WAUKESHA...EASTERN JEFFERSON AND WESTERN KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 440 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Okauchee Lake to Twin Lakes, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waukesha, New Berlin, Brookfield, Menomonee Falls, Muskego, Antioch, Pewaukee, Sussex, Elkhorn, Hartland, Lake Geneva, Mukwonago, Delafield, Elm Grove, Union Grove, East Troy, Paddock Lake, Wales, Camp Lake and Okauchee Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
